author: R Vishal | India.com Sports Desk
title: Barcelona vs Bate Borisov: Watch Live Telecast Online of UEFA Champions League 2015-16 match
text:
Barcelona vs Bate Borisov: Watch Live Telecast Online of UEFA Champions League 2015-16 match By India.com Sports Desk on October 21, 2015 at 12:09 AM Comments 
Barcleona fill face BATE Borisov in the UEFA Champions League 2015-16 and they will be taking on BATE Borisov from Belarus. The match is all set to take place at 12:15 am IST and 11.45 PST and live telecast in India will be on Ten Action and Ten HD . Viewers in the UK can watch the match live on BT Sport. Click here for the live streaming link . Barcelona are without the services of Lionel Messi but still look good to get three points on the board. 
The biggest blow that Barcelona have received in recent weeks is Lionel Messi missing out for a month. The danger is far from over for the home side, who will be facing Luis Suarez and a rampaging Neymar, who is coming into the game after scoring four goals in a single game. Barcleonaâ€™s league form has been slightly erratic compared to the heights that they reached last season. Even in the Champions League, the defending champions had to see out a draw and will have a stern test on their hands to top the group. 
Bate have already showed that they can upset opponents and that is exactly what they did against AS Roma in the earlier matchweek. They competed well against Bayern Leverkusen as well and they have been in good form. Can they stage an upset with a packed house supporting them? BATE were thrashed four years ago in both legs when they faced Barcelona in the UEFA Champions League 
Predicted Squads 
Barcelona Ter Stegen, Alves, Pique, Mascherano, Alba; Busquests, Rakitic, Segi; Neymar, Suarez, Munir El Haddadi 
Bate Borisov Chemik, Olekhnovich, Polyakov, Milunovic, Mladenovic; Alekseivech, Nicolic, Volodko, Stasevic; Gordeichuk, Signevich
